# Je ne sais jamais par où commencer

## Les outils

### Grid

- https://www.lambdatest.com/blog/best-css-grid-layout-generators/ bon article

- https://layout.bradwoods.io/customize 
Pas le plus simple d'accès mais complet et très réussi visuellement

### FlexBox
https://progressivered.com/fla/?d=2&v=1&h=4&s=2&i=2121&a=1000 :Layout helper based on CSS flexbox specification designed to serve you as quick flexbox shorthand by using two custom html attributes — 'layout' and 'self': 


### Form
- https://beautifytools.com/html-form-builder.php : le plus basique de tous
- https://bootsnipp.com/forms
- https://faary.com/#!

##Inspiration

### Form
- https://uicookies.com/beautiful-css-forms/
- https://freefrontend.com/css-forms/
